conclusion: Analyze forces on the block and board to find frictional force magnitude.
Block P of mass m slides on board ab of mass M on horizontal ground; block moves right, board stationary; coefficients of friction are μ1 and μ2.
Block P moving right implies frictional force F_P on ab acts on block opposing motion.
Board ab stationary indicates frictional force F_ab on P equals frictional force F_ground on ab.
Frictional force F_ab on P is μ2 mg.
Frictional force F_ground on ab is μ1 Mg.
Since board is stationary, F_ab on P = F_ground on ab.
Solving for μ1 gives μ1 = (m/M) μ2.
Magnitude of frictional force by ground on board is μ1 Mg = (m/M) μ2 Mg = μ2 mg.
